marketplace.title: Service Marketplace
marketplace.description: Discover and access premium services using your staking rewards or by staking tokens
marketplace.connectWallet: Connect your wallet to access and use services
marketplace.tokensLocked: Tokens will be locked and returned after the period ends
marketplace.serviceUsedSuccess: Service used successfully! Cost: {{cost}} SOL from rewards
marketplace.insufficientRewards: Insufficient rewards. Please stake in pools to earn rewards.

staking.title: Staking Pools
staking.description: Stake your SOL tokens to earn rewards that can be used to access premium services
staking.connectWallet: Connect your wallet to start staking and earning rewards
staking.step1Desc: Select a staking pool that matches your risk tolerance and time commitment
staking.step2Desc: Lock your tokens for the specified duration to start earning rewards
staking.step3Desc: Use your accumulated rewards to access premium services in the marketplace

provider.title: Service Provider Dashboard
provider.description: Register and manage your services on the Stakelona marketplace
provider.connectWallet: Connect your wallet to register and manage services
provider.benefit1Desc: Monetize your AI agents, content, or access to events and games
provider.benefit2Desc: Choose pay-per-use or stake-based subscription models
provider.benefit3Desc: Monitor usage, revenue, and customer satisfaction
provider.noServicesDesc: Start by registering your first service
provider.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
provider.setPricePerRequest: Please set a price per request
provider.setStakeAmountDuration: Please set stake amount and duration

dashboard.title: My Dashboard
dashboard.description: Track your stakes, rewards, and service usage
dashboard.connectWalletDesc: Please connect your wallet to view your dashboard
dashboard.noActiveStakes: No active pool stakes. Visit the Staking Pools section to start earning rewards!
dashboard.noActiveSubscriptions: No active service subscriptions. Browse the marketplace to access premium services!
